website_summaries.verdict: This 16-shade eyeshadow palette contains a bold selection of glitter, matte, shimmer, and pearl shades.
pros: The four diamond-shaped glitter shades are a pressed gel formula for sparkle with staying power and do not require glitter glue
The shimmer shades are highly pigmented for an intense shine, while the mattes are creamy with useful colors for blending and deepening
cons: There’s a learning curve to applying the glitter shades without getting sparkly fallout

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Best makeup pallet. You will feel like a movie star
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Worth every penny. The package is gorgeous. Looks like a jewelry box. Colors are outstanding. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed you think you spend twenty or more on a pallets it wouldn’t come broken
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey berry

customer_reviews.title: Glitter for Days!!!
customer_reviews.text: YES YES YES! Glitter Glitter everywhere and well worth the price. Saw it in Ulta and I just had to get it because of how the glitter shades really stick and stay to my eyelids. Super super beautiful and really clubby
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pallet! All the colors are extremely pigmented, go on evenly and blend very well. I have nothing but good things to say about this pallet!
customer_reviews.author: brandy harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute but pricey
customer_reviews.text: The presentation is adorable. Along with the jewelry theme, the packaging looks like a jewelry box. I love the range of colors and textures but I do feel it was over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Make up lady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but glitter is not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Swatches beautifully but once you put the sparkles on your face they do not go on well, even with glitter glue. The regular colors are very nice but not impressed with the sparkles. I’m so sad I really thought with the brand name palette I would finally find a good sparkle to wear on my wedding day eyes :/
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Pawlowski

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. I ordered 3 of these for Christmas gifts and they were all the size they are supposed to be and nothing was broken like some have claimed in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Britini Paige

customer_reviews.title: It looks better then it actually is.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors but I do not like that it's not as sparkly as it looks. Also it's super hard to get off because the sparkles spread all over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Castro

customer_reviews.title: Two faced pallette
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at and hold. The colors are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Clara PadillaTurley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sexy palette
customer_reviews.text: Seemed as though it was opened or used when I received besides that would give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Aria Khaide

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Eyeshadow !
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy that one of the Eyeshadow's was Broken/cracked. This palette was not cheap! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This palette is really beautiful. The colors are lovely and very user friendly. The glitters? Stop it. So beautiful and easy to use. I did not use a glitter glue and they stayed on my eyes all day. I have mature skin and there was NO creasing or flaking at all. LOVE! I have two other too faced palette’s and I love them as well, so I am not really surprised. But I do my research, read reviews and watch reviews and thought I would leave one to help maybe a more mature person decide if they can use this palette; and yes, you can. I really enjoy it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan mallard

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful all around!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this eyeshadow palette I saw it first at Ulta then I saw it at the PX on base so I definitely had to order I love the colors the presentation beautiful the Box beautiful none of the eyeshadows were broken like I had read in other reviews so I just took a chance on ordering it I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Thawny Rae

customer_reviews.title: Lovely eyeshadows !!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty colors and went on smoothly. As far as the glitter eye shadow you have to put a primer on your lids to make it set and Too Face makes one!! Pretty packaging that looks nice on makeup table.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This product looked like the eyeshadow got wet and doesn’t apply well. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michaele

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it but the delivery could of been a whole lot better!!!
customer_reviews.author: A1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty palette
customer_reviews.text: The palette is lovely. Very pigmented and goes on smoothly without creasing. There is some fallout when using the glitter shades; but not that much. Probably better to use an eyelid primer. Easily removed with makeup remover. This item was packaged very securely and was in perfect condition when received.
customer_reviews.author: sparkles

customer_reviews.title: The best pallette!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pallette! The colors are rich and very pigmented. I get compliments every time i wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this but came broken and all over the inside of the box. Returning the damaged item
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but broken
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged didn’t worth the hassle of returning .
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: The glitter shadows changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I only bought for the glitter shadows. WORTH IT! you touch on finger, touch on eye bam its on. no brushes, it doesnt move, I can't find more colors that's the only negative. I get stopped almost everyday about this glitter shadow I wear it to my job (which is over the top I know) but people love it.
customer_reviews.author: peanutandbuttons

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Colors, Doesn't Go On Well
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, but it doesn't spread well for being so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: jlala

customer_reviews.title: USED!!
customer_reviews.text: Says brand new but you can tell it’s used and they tried so hard to make it look new .
customer_reviews.author: Aleigha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful 😍
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this palette! The colors are rich, highly pigmented and gorgeous! The glitter colors are the perfect addition to your shadows to make your eyes dazzle. I would definitely buy this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in sephora and it is my favorite pallet. The glitter shades don't grab to your brush but do go on well and stay well when applied by finger.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Decay

product_meta.title: Too Faced Pretty Rich Diamond Light Eye Shadow Palette
product_meta.description: Apply to eye lids and go bold, sassy, classic chic, or for whatever your feeling for the day. You can't go wrong with any of these rich colors. For all eye colors.
